other_tests.procedure_name: Bayley Scales of Infant Development II (BSID-II)
other_tests.findings: Gross Motor Quotient (GMQ) of 87, Fine Motor Quotient (FMQ) of 82, Total Motor Quotient (TMQ) of 83, and Psychomotor Development Index (PDI) of 84.
Increased total bilirubin (131.2 µmol/L), direct bilirubin (22.2 µmol/L), glutamyl transpeptidase (598 U/L), and alkaline phosphatase (324 U/L).
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 1 month, elevated levels of alanine transaminase (61 U/L), aspartate aminotransferase (86 U/L), total bile acid (109 µmol/L), and phosphorus (3.22 mmol/L) were evident. At 3 months, elevated triglycerides (2.21 mmol/L) were noted, and at 6 months, elevated cholesterol (8.88 mmol/L) was observed.

other_tests.procedure_name: Eye examination (including fundus and slit lamp examination)
Genetic testing using the Clinical 4000 Pathogenic Gene Package
other_tests.findings: Identified a heterozygous variation in intron 33 of the NOTCH2 gene (c.5930-2A > G), confirmed as a de novo mutation.
Found no other genetic mutations matching the patient's phenotype beyond the NOTCH2 mutation.
